features.name: Authentication
features.description: Manages user authentication, including login, sign-up, and session management using Supabase Auth.

features.name: Agenda/Calendar
features.description: Feature for managing user schedules, events, and appointments with different calendar views (day, week, month).

features.name: Financial Management
features.description: Allows users to track income, expenses, view financial reports, and manage accounts.

features.name: Task Management
features.description: A to-do list feature for users to manage their tasks, including creation, updates, and status tracking.

features.name: Goal Setting
features.description: Users can set and track personal or financial goals.

features.name: Notifications
features.description: System for displaying alerts and notifications to the user.

features.name: User Profile
features.description: Users can view and edit their profile information, including avatar.

features.name: Support System
features.description: A system for users to create, view, and manage support tickets.
